column5:
The game is literally designed to frustrate you. You have no control over the other four people, and by the time you do start typing negative things the game most likely is already over. Your draven didn't get snowballed, your top laner never got jungle ganks etc

we either shouldn't have chat at all or get voice chat so that context can actually be applied.
Now you guys are just not as unique as you seem to think you are

I'll gladly give you my real name and I would gladly play with my real name tied to. I do it in dota and steam all the time. It's not a huge deal, just one company knows the bad words are going to get said and another company is run by molesters who would rather censor everybody
Sorry I wasn't raised to sit there and just take it like a little bitch
Because she's broken I like free wins
And you sound like every liberal arts student I've ever met
Riot games where it's okay to molest women but it's not okay to say a naughty word
Next thing you're going to tell me as I can't tell my close friends that they are faggots or niggers. Just words

If the kid needed a hug, he shouldn't have been playing online videogames? 

I swear there needs to be some kind of test before people are allowed to play that warns them that there might be naughty words and people aren't going to be their friend. 

Like what happened that used to tell you in Xbox live that chat was not rated in to be warned and you would get called a faggot right off the bat. I still remember being a wide-eyed little kid and being yelled at by a bunch of dudes because I screwed up in MechAssault and you know what it made me play better because I didn't want to get yelled at anymore go figure.
I call my friends faggots all the time it's not a big deal, words only have power when people give them power so people stop making a big deal about it it wouldn't be a big deal

The only way to not get banned is to completely disable the chat 

Great game design Riot really coddling the babies in their safe spaces.

The fact that you feel that way is so sad you should feel justified in your anger towards somebody else for screwing you over. this is the problem with systems like this it makes people think that they're the problem when in reality it's the design of the game that's the issue

If you feed two+ deaths in a lane that you knew that you were going to be counter picked in you better expect me to say something to you especially if I already said not to pick the champion you picked
How so ? I didn't raise them to be little girls crying emotionally over every little thing. They had bad parents

I feel like half the problems in this game stem from the fact that everyone is so sensitive all the time. Remember when you used to be able to call your friend a faggot and it was okay because the context of the word wasn't being used badly?

Isn't it great that you have to turn off chat in a game based on team play? 

How well-designed and thought out
It works for us in DotA
And I see why you didn't your riots perfect lap dog. a shining example of falling in line and doing what you're told like a good little soldier
A game stupid people shouldn't be allowed to play
you probably will people will say that you're being sexist or something the world is a shit hole now full of pansies who can't handle anything.
Then you're getting way lucky because most people are floundering morons even in higher ELO
The difference is how your emotions handle it
Why do we even have a chat at all then nobody should be allowed to say anything
I don't tolerate stupidity, I've been permit multiple times even lost an account that every single champion
I care why? I want to play to win not baby sit
Nope nobody should be allowed to say or do anything these days because people are too sensitive
Why not, would fix things wouldn't it?
you do get banned for calling people out they go I don't like that you said something pre-made report them and then you get in trouble

My coach used to call us panty wearing sissies in front of our parents and nobody said anything if we screwed up

Times have changed and people are weak now

Who do you want on your team? 

Someone who's stupid but having a good time

Or 


Someone who's 'toxic' but actually knows how to play the game

The choice shouldn't be that hard
Not at all, I've been permad several times because I always hurt people's feelings. Not my fault people can't handle naughty words
If someone lacks the ability to take criticism without getting their feelings hurt they don't deserve to play online games
If someone lacks the ability to take basic criticism without getting their feelings hurt they don't deserve to play online games
Not at all if they lack the ability to play the game they shouldn't be allowed to play
Yeah no one should be allowed to speak their mind everyone should be forced to be a good little boy and fall in line

The thing is it's not just my game it's a game I'm being forced to play with four other people. So when one person acts the fool and doesn't expect me to call them out on it, that's a little silly don't you think? 

Do you think coaches just hold their tongue and don't say anything because they don't want to hurt their players feelings?
It's also bias as hell
It should be though that's the point you shouldn't be able to be stupid if I can't be an asshole about how dumb you are
If you have multiple accounts to one email it's all tied to the same thing. You'll actually get punished faster
Then there should be a stupid person banning system it should go both ways
That's like asking the stupid people to stop being stupid
Anything else you want to censor us from being able to say Gestapo?

It's actually tied to your account you have to use a new email every time or else you have toxicity against you. every time I make a new account I can't say anything without getting in trouble even if it's not derogatory at this point. I have to make new emails if I make a new account. and no I won't stop flaming people until they have a voice feature where I can bark orders at them like the dogs they are
No hero let's you do that yet... But Winter Wyvern can make enemies kill each other
Wouldn't that just make it more soul-crushing when your team drafts bad heroes intentionally

Garruk is Hunter

Vivian is a ranger

One stalks and kills, the other works along side.

Gameplay wise: Garruk also usually has Mana manipulation abilities or token generation where Vivian has creature flash to represent her arc bow
Yeah man what's up
Welcome to the fold fellow Ravnica DM
Vore Core
Get something to give him lifelink like [[Basilisk Collar]]
I started to do this! Glad I'm not the only one
The nuclear option lol
I don't want to do that if I don't have to
I mean I'm not devoid of humor, but like he doesn't even try to spice it up

So just accept it?

Kinda frustrating, but I guess you're right this is the best rp some people can muster
I'd never seen these tinderbox things
Oh thanks, you've been so helpful
Yeah I think the personal goals thing is a good idea so people who want to fight can find one and the ones who don't won't
I've got a mix of both, I'm just trying to accommodate
I'm just trying to make them rp more and want to smash/kill more lol

I may keep that in mind, it could fit in

Thanks for the tools
Honestly a majority of their personal goals are story tied, not many of them care about anything that isn't combat, but this session has little need fort it
I had it on lycan not too long ago
Unless they changed it recently
It totally does work, makes you a 500 range hello
I always like the Run Them Down Build with Battery Assault/Tag Team/Flame Guard and a good initiation ult
Welcome brother, remember always first pick Shakuchi or Atrophy Aura
Time is his biggest counter play. He is a roadblock
He has plenty of counter play, it's just not enjoyable if you came to the game to kill kill kill
Why not though? Why can't the "easier"kits have good winrate
Hey, I'm just saying he is healthy for the game

How do you know?

What if Q just blinked him on you and did damage so he could Spin while you ran

For every Invoker there must be a Wraith King. 

Because they bring much more to the table overall, just because something is stronkb doesn't mean it's broken
Upvoted my good sir
So should the only Champions that are strong be the ones that require jumping through eight hoops to do something as simple as a stun?
Hey, I'm just raising awareness
Or if W dashed him ahead even while using E
Why think when others can do it for you

Good luck trying to speak reason here

Garen is on a tier list so now he is the most broken thing that ever existed until the next champion is
Just watch Necrits videos
The Malz and Mord tax
They are on a different layer of the map
Not even, DotA isn't just a mess of imba
No one cares
Everyone in the game had skill shot cc who had cc
It just reads like DOTA BAD RAWWWR
3 people on your team have knock ups
Riot does FotM balancing, it's intentionally done
What does that "made DotA bad" comment about lol
I just have it to trigger people
Oh no she actually may need to try to win the game

I feel like that's more your frustration than the actual balance of the champion itself. 

You're mad that their skill translation is less important than yours
How is that his fault and not the fault of the busted ass nimbus cloak changes that are making a lot of immobile people strong atm

To me, Darius is no different than DotAs Viper. An immobile, highly punishing Lane bully. They both force you to play a different game and kick just about everyone out of their Lanes. 

They both fall off and can be exploited for being so immobile
Neither do you, you'll cling to them because you put in the time for the wins
She always will be with infinite dashes
She has a weak point that isn't just the pilot
I know her ilk, the "highskill cap overloaded kit" class
That and because of fotm balancing I know she will be back
Oh I have experience playing against her
